message.content:
cs.RO, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG 

The paper describes a robotic system that uses natural language instructions to guide its perception, which falls under the category of robotics (cs.RO). The system also involves symbolic reasoning and decision-making, which are common topics in artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Additionally, the system uses computer vision techniques to perceive the environment (cs.CV). The natural language processing component of the system also falls under the category of computational linguistics (cs.CL). Finally, the system involves machine learning and optimization techniques to improve its performance, which are topics in machine learning (cs.LG).
